phrases: It is okay, he has a pulse.
But he is covered in blood!
Maybe it was splattered on him.
Let us carry him to the school.
We should at least have the infirmary doctor look at him.
It is the name of that ridiculous robot.
You are not Sakimori Academy students?
There is a ventilation duct over there.
What is the meaning of this, L-elf?!
Why turn your gun on us?!
I do not know how I got into this body, but I am Haruto!
Why the hell should I hand over my cell to you people?!
Let go of me, you bastards!
I run this school, you Dorssian dicks!
Am I not going to let you act like you own
There is no point in resisting!
The JIOR homeland has already surrendered unconditionally!
I will say it again so it will sink through those peace-softened skulls!
It was not just here that was attacked?
The country of JIOR no longer exists!
This is now an incorporated territory of Greater Dorssia!
Is that really you in there, Haruto?
I have mixed feelings that it took a game to prove it is me, but yeah.
It is pretty hazy, but I remember climbing down from that robot, and then...
Have you even fired a gun before?
Even if you lose your memory, you can still talk or use a phone or whatever, right?
So that means that the owner of this body fought on a daily basis?
We have to do more than that.
I am going to take back that robot and smash those Dorssian bastards!
Otherwise, it does not even come close to balancing out what I lost.
The JIOR government has agreed to an unconditional surrender.
The annexation of JIOR seems to have been successful.
We have finished neutralizing the enemy's combat potential in Module 77.
Displacement of the JIOR populace is currently underway.
We were able to secure the primary strategic objective with relatively little damage.
He is a student at that school that was shown on the net.
L-elf injured A-drei and remains at large.
I cannot believe someone from the Karlstein Agency would turn traitor...
I guess this is the first blemish on the reputation of the Perfection Army.
They do not get to kill Shoko and then plead for their own lives.
Inzukua-senpai, you and the girls stay here.
This next part is going to involve killing.
Haruto, what is gotten into you?
If I do not at least avenge her, I could never forgive myself.
You saw how much power it put out.
What is a neutral country like JIOR doing with tech like this?
This design is based on a totally new line of thinking...
Right, they were giving off smoke in the battle yesterday.
Why did they make it humanoid?
The real mystery is why the frame changed color like it did.
I guess this thing does not handle like a bike!
It is not safe in here!
The primary strategic objective has been stolen!
We will just recreate what you did the first time.
And this will turn me back to normal?
That is how it usually works in the movies.
It is something I can do, so I guess I have to try.
I am in my own body!
We are both back to normal, right?
Let us get out of here!
Let us use this chance to leave the Module.
We can rendezvous with our forces outside.
This is We are in space...
There is no surface, how do I
A single unit cannot possibly win!
That is the light that was in the reports?
Do not push yourself too hard, A-drei.
Your injuries are not healed yet.
That is why I am going.
The pride of the Dorssian army, the heavy strategic weapon Ideal...
This is how we could fight ARUS as more than equals though Dorssia was weaker as a country.
If it reaches 100, it stops moving!
If you keep it running too long, it overheats.
Signal them that you are standing down.
Hey, what is he talking about?
You shot one of your own people.
Thanks so much for turning traitor!
I always wanted to see what it was like to fight you, L-elf!
I will be the one to settle things with L-elf.
What did you people do to me?!
It looks like the whole car got buried.
I made certain that he was dead.
But compared to his clothes, the damage to his body is nonexistent.
I am so glad you are alive...
Sorry, my battery's about to die.
We can just talk face to face.
I have no memory of shooting A-drei.
But I have injuries I do not remember getting...
What happened to my body while I was blacked out?
Shoko, when I get back, let us pick up our talk where we left off.
The one in front of the shrine.
I said I would come back for her!
The engine sound is still running.
The medical box on the seat back shows signs of being rewritten
so all the text would be in the same sans serif style.
It is clear that this cockpit's designer had a pathological attention to detail.
But look at the scale of the heat capacity gauge.
I find it hard to believe that such a designer would use a number that has no significance.
Why would it do this while there are so many alerts going off?
I will start by ripping off your arms and legs!
I do not want to die.
I made a promise to Shoko!
That is I would come back to her alive, no matter what!
I do not like the looks of that!
I am sure that I killed you.
Why do not I remember doing it?!
You did all of it, did not you?
You sent them to look for me, did not you?
Nah, it was no big deal...
So, about picking up where we left off?
The thing is, I think you are...
Who makes a T-shirt like that?
And it is signed by the creator's mom!
You were looking all serious, and that is what you say to me?!
Well, your lack of fashion sense is that serious.
I have been holding it in for hours!
I have been turned into a monster!
I do not have the right to tell her how I really feel...
Valvrave the Liberator; it is the system to reveal the truth of the world.
